Space Swing

2017

Game Design, Art, Programming

What I Learned

Procedurally generated levels based on repeating handcrafted chunks, 2D parallax visual effects, and ship swinging physics.

Description

Your ship is out of fuel and the space police are right on your tail! Use your trusty chain and swing your way through the asteroid field to survive as long as possible. My friend Nathan and I challenged each other to a week-long competition to see who could remake one of his old games better. Our friends judged and could not pick a winner, but ill let you decide. Play Nathan’s version

  

App icon on parallax background.

  

Starting cutscene in which the player runs out of gas in an intense space police chase.

  

A chain allows the player to swing between astroids and spaceships.

  

Example of ship game art created in Sketch
